ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] New Guild Forming in Tribunal
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it took me a little bit, but I have started a mage char for this guild. She just got started so she s still lvl 1. (lol I haven t even killed anything
ygData.messageBody:
Well it took me a little bit, but I have started a mage char for this
guild. She just got started so she's still lvl 1. (lol I haven't even
killed anything yet.) I have never played a mage before. How much
harder is it to play then an enchanter?

Also I'm sorry for not posting lately. I've had some major tests in
Bio and Psych. I've also managed to break my hand again so it's in a
cast. The bad part is the cast goes past my elbow so it's kinda hard
to use a mouse right now.

I'll be able to play more during the Quarter Break. I'll also be able
to play a bit more next quarter since my schedule won't be so
horrible and the classes will be easier.

Raven
